main.text: Some are rookies. Some finally turned a corner. But all are players we'll be talking about for a while.
main.title: Breakouts to watch down stretch

main.text: Juan Soto belts a solo homer into the left-center-field seats, his 20th of the year and third most as a teenager, cutting the deficit to 1
main.title: Soto's 20th home run

main.text: Josh Donaldson crushes a home run to left field to record his first hit with the Indians, going back-to-back with Edwin Encarnacion
main.title: Donaldson's 1st Tribe hit, homer
Shohei Ohtani and Mike Trout tried on retro Mighty Ducks jerseys for Ducks Night at Angel Stadium

main.text: Lorenzo Cain races to his left and jumps to make an incredible catch at the wall, robbing Jordy Mercer of a homer in the 2nd
main.title: Cain robs Mercer of a home run

main.text: Max Scherzer is drenched during his at-bat with Ronald Acuna Jr., who flares a single into right field to score two Braves and tie the game
main.title: Acuna Jr. scores 2 on soaked Max

main.text: Jay Bruce belts a three-run home run to right field in the top of the 3rd inning, extending the Mets' lead to 4-0
main.title: Bruce's 3-run home run

main.text: There's more than one way to reel in a baseball.
main.title: A definitive guide to the nine ways you can catch a foul ball

main.text: Aaron Altherr cranks a three-run homer to left, his second of the game, giving the Phillies an 8-0 lead and bringing his RBI total to five
main.title: Altherr's 2nd HR, a 3-run jack

main.text: Jeimer Candelario launches a leadoff home run over the left-field wall to give the Tigers an early 1-0 lead
main.title: Candelario's leadoff smash

main.text: Yankees manager Aaron Boone says Aaron Judge has been activated off the DL for defense and baserunning, but will not hit yet
main.title: Judge comes off DL, won't hit

main.text: Gleyber Torres beats the shift with a single through the right side, scoring Aaron Hicks to increase the lead to 3-0 in the 1st
main.title: Torres' single plates Hicks

main.text: Daniel Palka joins the Chatting Cage to discuss the biggest lesson he has learned in his first year in the Major Leagues
main.title: Palka on biggest lesson learned

main.text: Jose Ramirez charges and makes a backhanded stop up the middle, then quickly throws to nab Dawel Lugo at first in the 2nd inning
main.title: Ramirez's superb stop, throw

main.text: Craig Kimbrel, Zack Greinke and Steve Cishek had some of the filthiest pitches this past week
main.title: This week's NASTIEST pitches
